en.title: Confirm your email
en.e_intro:
Hey ${email},

Welcome to ${product_name}, your simple and flexible to-do list for work, home and everywhere else. Please confirm your email address to get full access to ${product_name}.
en.e_btn_link_intro:
If you're unable to click on the button above, please copy and paste the URL into a new browser window instead.
https://${site_domain}/sign/verifyEmail?id=${verify_id}

Thanks for being part of ${product_name}:)

zh.title: 验证邮箱
zh.e_intro:
Hi ${email}，

欢迎加入滴答清单:)
从今天起，${product_name}将陪伴您开启时间管理的旅程。为了更好的享受${product_name}的所有服务，请点击下方按钮验证您的邮箱。
zh.e_btn_link_intro:
如果无法通过点击按钮打开，请将下方链接复制并粘贴到浏览器中打开。
https://${site_domain}/sign/verifyEmail?id=${verify_id}
